strings.STR_COMPLETE_MISSION_1_PERFECT: Complete mission 1 with a 3 star rating
strings.STR_COMPLETE_MISSION_2_PERFECT: Complete mission 2 with a 3 star rating
strings.STR_COMPLETE_MISSION_WITHOUT_POWERUP: Complete a mission without using a powerup
strings.STR_DESTROY_5_ENEMIES_ROW: Destroy 5 enemies in a row without being hit

strings.STR_DESTROY_50_ENEMIES_ROW: Destroy 50 enemies in a row without being hit

strings.STR_DESTROY_50_ENEMIES_WINGMEN: Destroy 50 enemies with the wingmen powerup
strings.STR_DESTROY_100_ENEMIES_WINGMEN: Destroy 100 enemies with the wingmen powerup
strings.STR_DESTROY_10_ENEMIES_ROCKET: Destroy 10 enemies with the rocket powerups

strings.STR_DESTROY_100_ENEMIES_ROCKET: Destroy 100 enemies with the rocket powerups
strings.STR_DESTROY_10_ENEMIES_BLASTER: Destroy 10 enemies with the blaster canon powerup

strings.STR_ACHIEVE_50000_SIMULATION_MODE: Achieve a score of 50000 in Simulation Mode

strings.STR_ENDLESS_CHANGE_LOCATION_10: Change location 10 times in simulation mode
